code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const LogInOut_button=()=>{const[Button,updateBtn]=useState(' Login');const[BtnLink,updateLink]=useState();const check_login=async()=>{let status=await fetch(`/login_check`);let status_data=await status.json();console.log(status_data,'at brower');switch(status_data.message){case'undefined_user_accessed':updateBtn('Login');updateLink('/login');break;case undefined:updateBtn('Log Out');updateLink('/logout');break;}};useEffect(()=>{check_login();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(React.Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"LogInOut_button Account_nevbar_child_components",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:`${BtnLink}`,children:Button})})});};
